::Spears:;

She looked up at him and smiled at him. She chuckled,"You may have a 
point.  You look very dirty." She smiled and laughed.  She kissed him 
and looked at him again.  "Well, aren't you going to help me up or 
just lay there smearing dirt on my armor?" She chuckled.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker smiles as he feels Spears hand move over his body, leaning 
slightly 
> back to look into her eyes. They were both covered with soot, and 
the Ark 
> itself wasn't too clean either. An idea occurs to him, Striker 
looking into 
> Spears' eyes.
> 
> "Hey, how about we go on a walk? I think it would be more sanitary 
than 
> laying here..."
